casebody.data:
IN RE: NOMINATION PETITIONS OF Theresa WRIGHT as a Congressional Candidate for the 5th Congressional District of the State of Pennsylvania Appeal of: Angela Washington and Gina H. Curry No. 13 MAP 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Submitted: April 18, 2018
Decided: April 30, 2018 Kathleen Marie Kotula, Esq., Pennsylvania Department of State, for Department of State, Participants. Margaret M. Stuski, Esq., Creative Benefits Inc., for Angela Washington and Gina H. Curry, Appellants. Theresa M. Wright, pro se.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 30 th day of April, 2018, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED . The Application for Leave to File a Post-Submission Communication is DENIED .
